8000.description: Port for web interface. Suggested default: 8420.
8000.label: WebUI port

/data.description: Choose a Share for data file storage.
/data.label: Config paperless Data - Storage

/media.description: Choose a Share for media storage.
/media.label: Config paperless Media - Storage

/export.description: Choose a Share for exported documents.
/export.label: Config paperless Export - Storage

/consume.description: Choose a Share for importing documents.
/consume.label: Config paperless Import - Storage

PAPERLESS_REDIS.description: Set to redis://paperless-broker:6379.Redis connection URL. Do not change unless you know what you are doing.
PAPERLESS_REDIS.label: Redis URL

PAPERLESS_DBHOST.description: Set to paperless-db. Hostname of the PostgreSQL database container.
PAPERLESS_DBHOST.label: Database Hostname

PAPERLESS_DBNAME.description: Enter the name of the PostgreSQL database.
PAPERLESS_DBNAME.label: PostgreSQL Database name

PAPERLESS_DBUSER.description: Enter the username for the PostgreSQL database.
PAPERLESS_DBUSER.label: Database User name

PAPERLESS_DBPASS.description: Enter the Database password for PostgreSQL
PAPERLESS_DBPASS.label: Database User password for PostgreSQL

PAPERLESS_ADMIN_USER.description: Enter the username for the paperless-ngx superuser.
PAPERLESS_ADMIN_USER.label: Superuser username

PAPERLESS_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: This will be the password of the automatically created superuser.
PAPERLESS_ADMIN_PASSWORD.label: Superuser password

/data.description: Choose a Share for Redis data.
/data.label: Redis Data Share

/var/lib/postgresql/data.description: Choose a Share for PostgreSQL database storage.
/var/lib/postgresql/data.label: PostgreSQL Storage

POSTGRES_USER.description: Enter the username for the PostgreSQL database.
POSTGRES_USER.label: PostgreSQL Database Username

POSTGRES_PASSWORD.description: Enter the password for the PostgreSQL database user.
POSTGRES_PASSWORD.label: PostgreSQL Database Password

Paperless-ngx.description:
Paperless-ngx is a community-supported open-source document management system that transforms your physical documents into a searchable online archive so you can keep, well, less paper..

Based on a Docker image: Paperless-ngx. Available for amd64 and arm64 architectures.
